content.detailedDescription: I like to take pics of the sky. i walked to my car after work and decided to pull out my camera and snapped 3pics of the sky. got in my car to view the photos when i saw the second pic i discovered a yellow orb with some sort of grayish grainy halo. when i returned home i transferred it to my tablet for a better look. it definitely seemed solid. at a later point i decided to browse through my other photos of the sky i found 3 more pictures with orbs . some white some yellow.
content.summary: I took a pic. of the sky when viewing later i noticed a yellow orb.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this over head riding my bike went home we lived with the power lines going thru our land told family we looked out window it arrived at the power lines then started glowing light very bright but did not go to ground 20 feet from ground my brother ran acroos street to get better look my mother called pease airforce base 2 investeegaters interviewed our family
content.summary: Tryangle in shap with a round inentation in the center of the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i live between allentown and emmaus,pa. in a residential area.
on the evening of nov.14, 2014 at 5:45 pm while departing our house to dine with another couple we spotted approx. 9 ivory/white lights in an up-side down "v" formation. our car was next to our house and the front was positioned directly toward the lights, our 12 o'clock and 30 degrees vertically from the horizon. the number of lights and the perfect formation immediately caught our attention as they were moving slowly towards us (northern direction). my wife was closing the front door of our house and i commented to her in a normal speaking tone,"what in the h-- is that?"
initially we thought they were helicopters heading for queen city airport two miles from us. the field has two paved runways and is
home for many light aircraft and several  business jets. sometimes an army chinook helicopter lands there briefly.
we walked across our street into a dead end street which is perpendicular to our street to avoid a street lamp and by then the lights stopped movement.
 the formation consisted of three lights on the left leg, one light on the point and five lights on the right leg. all were circular and bright white/red with somewhat blurry edges. my wife remembers them initially as being red however i saw them as she was closing our front door. it appeared they were ivory/white and after a minute or two i could see red in the mid section much like the equator is on earth but not a distinct border on the lights. the wide blurry red mid section (at least one third of the dia. of each light) on each was moving, either blinking very slowly or perhaps rotating.  
they appeared to be very slightly flickering with blurry edges but that might've been due to the  atmospheric conditions.
i'd estimate the brightness was that of a car's headlight from two miles away. altitude was unknown and we estimated their location  as above the eastern area of emmaus, pa. and several miles from us. they were brighter than any star but were smaller than the size 
of venus on a mostly clear night.
there was not any sound heard during any time of this sighting.
the sky in our area was mostly clear with a number of  clouds which were formed in a horizontal position. i did not see any moon and few stars were seen. we live near many new car dealers which have many lights in their lots and a small shopping center is directly across the street from the car dealers.
shortly after stopping the three lights on the left leg began a vertical movement  one above the other and faded becoming entirely red in color. they might have went into a cloud but i could not see (any cloud) at that distance. after the three faded away we heard and saw a one engine light aircraft  to our right coming out of the east and heading in a westerly direction on an intersecting course with the lights. our ground lights made it possible for me to see the aircraft which appeared white with a light trim color. possibly yellow. i'd estimate the aircraft's altitude was approx. 2,000 ft. at the same time three very bright white lights appeared behind and below much farther out (south) from the right leg of the formation. they appeared to be moving in a northerly direction to catch up with the lights that were stationary. they could've been the three lights that were in the left leg that climbed and faded away and were returning. these lights were now appearing much brighter and were similiar to an aircraft landing light. the three lights were lined up abreast of each other 
meanwhile each light in the right leg of the initial formation took turns becoming brighter and a large white light appeared on the lights but not at the same time. no distinct pattern was seen. the two leading lights in the right leg came closer together almost touching and their color was definately bright red. 
the light aircraft was now very close to the unidentified lights and crossed in front of them. by then we could not hear the engine sound of the light aircraft.
the five lights remained stationary, somehow one light had disappeared leaving five lights, as we entered our car and drove  in a southernly direction to meet our friends who were about three miles from our house. a norfolk southern freight train passed us 150 ft. to our left (lehigh line to reading and harrisburg). the track elevation rises as the line enters emmaus,pa. 
after stopping for a series of signal lights, i saw four lights appear just above but way out from the train. this would be in my 10 o'clock position. they were closer or larger than before. while noticing they were yellow, i observed three additional lights appearing to their right (my left). these were larger and brighter with a deeper amber color and they were separated from the four yellow lights. i'd estimate their size as an aspirin held at my arms length, larger than the other lights. i strongly believe all these lights were the same that we saw at our house. our location at that time was about one mile plus from our house (in a straight line southernly in direction).
 i'm a military veteran and the three amber lights resembled flares but no smoke emitting from them and they were stationary.
our road dropped in elevation and between that and the moving freight train we could no longer see the lights. the time was about
6: 10 pm.
i am retired and have excellent eye sight with glasses mainly used for reading but i was wearing them during this entire event. i have been  a lifetime aviation enthusiast. the lights were definately not any type of aircraft or flares . 
the following day i stopped at the queen city airport and they indicated they had not heard about the sighting  and mentioned the airport closes around 6 pm. however the light aircraft we saw which i believe was a cessna could probably still land there as the field has night landing lights.
lehigh valley airport (abe) a medium size airport for airliners is about 8 to 10 miles northeast from our house and i'm sure they would've warned that light aircraft about the light objects if in fact
they appeared on their radar. we were very surprised the light aircraft headed directly towards the lights and came very close.
well over 100,000 people live in this very spread out area  which includes allentown, emmaus, bethlehem and other small towns.
pa. rt. 309 joins with interstate 78 and both are very heavily traveled plus it was friday night at rush hour. the lights had to be seen by many people.
 our thoughts during the sighting which still continues is this was a significant event. we have been to many air shows and aviation events over a period of many years. my wife told me that after the event she knew the lights had to be unidentified objects.
the light aircraft should not be too difficult to track down.
content.summary: 9 or10 bright lights in

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was in my back yard hoping to catch a few shooting stars from the meteor shower on my camera.  i had just set my camera down to self start when i looked up to wait and see what the camera might pick up. (i did not get this on camera. *sigh*)

2.  i first noticed the object because i was already looking for any movement and shooting stars.  it caught my eye because it came right into view of where i was looking in the sky for shooting stars.

3.  when i first saw it, i thought it was a plane.

4.  it was flying from south to north.  it changed direction in a l shaped pattern and flew east for a few seconds, changed directed in a l shaped pattern and flew north for a few seconds, changed direction again to the east in an l shaped pattern, and then again north in an l shaped pattern.  it disappeared suddenly without going behind any objects that would have hidden it from view.  also, when i first witnessed it, it appeared to be high up in sky, when it was directly overhead it was lower and more clear, as it moved away it rose in elevation again.

5.  i was not very scared at first because i did think it was a plane.  but as it grew closer and started to move around in the sky, i grew scared.  i am a night sky fan and love to watch meteor showers, lunar eclipses, comets, and so on.  so, in all the years i've been sky gazing i'd never seen anything like this before.  i was too scared to even go back out and view the rest of the meteor shower.  i had run in to post my sighting on facebook.

6.  i lost sight of the object when a bright meteor traveling along the same path intersected it.  when the meteor evaporated so did the object.  i couldn't see it again after that.
content.summary: Glowing orange spherical object of metallic material traveling from south to north w/ sharp directional changes.

content.detailedDescription: I like to take pics of the sky. i walked to my car after work and decided to pull out my camera and snapped 3pics of the sky. got in my car to view the photos when i saw the second pic i discovered a yellow orb with some sort of grayish grainy halo. when i returned home i transferred it to my tablet for a better look. it definitely seemed solid. at a later point i decided to browse through my other photos of the sky i found 3 more pictures with orbs . some white some yellow.
content.summary: I took a pic. of the sky when viewing later i noticed a yellow orb.

content.detailedDescription: I was finishing up class work when i felt the sudden urge to look up meteors. i was reminded of the shower, and ten minutes later went out to see the leonids peak at 2 am. i was looking at the northeast horizon when a glimmering, silvery object fluttering around the big dipper, or ursa major, turned in a loop above the bunker hill monument before disappearing behind a thin wisp of low lying clouds. the experience lasted no longer than ten seconds.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Mettalic reflective fluttering object above bunker hill monument, tracing ursa major

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside to watch the leonid meteor shower for a while this morning, i was staring straight up towards the radiant in the constellation leo. around 5:35am i saw movement out of the corner of my eye to the southwest. glanced over to my right and saw a fast moving object lightly orange like metal starting to get hot but not bright, moving southwest to south in direction away from the constellation of orion. i thought...We'll thats not a leonid meteor and did a double take because it never flared up or fireballed like i was seeing, plus it was moving in the wrong direction than the meteors i was observing. so i continued to watch it move and realised that it had shape, like a grey mass, spherical or oval but not quite defined.  i thought maybe it was an owl, but it was visibly orange hot looking on the bottom edge. that was the light that caught my eye. then it stopped dead still in the sky, thats when the hair on my neck stood up and i really paid attention. it stopped, then made an immediate change in direction due south for a good second or so, then stopped again, changed direction and moved east, stopped a third time and then just accelerated incredibly fast south out of sight.  if it was an owl, it had a glowing hot rear end. pretty incredible sighting. a first for me and i'm an amature astomomer, i am always out looking up at the night sky. i attached a rough sketch of what i remember it looking like.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Grey mass, appeared spherical/oval, hot looking orange at bottom edge, fast moving, stopped/hovered, abruptly changed direction, stopped abrupt change again, the accelerated very quickly out of sight to horizon

content.detailedDescription: I’m living on romania/europe and some parts of our country up to the mountains have really strange stories about extraterestrial activities! as we know up to the carpatian mountains not so far from cities –busteni and azuga exists even a secret army base !But the reason why i write to u is that couple years ago during a summer camp with kids up to the mountains not so far from the mentioned area i was taking pictures random without any purposes...Just taking photos! when i get home i started to erase the bad pictures and i get to the picture i’m talking about and when i have opened i tought that my monitor has some dust on it but i have realized that i take a picture of something wich i didn’t saw it and didn’t hear it on that moment !I have sent my picture to the a romanian ufo society and they said that i was taking a photo from a ufo but they didn’t have the tehnical support to clear the picture ! they forwarded my picture to a german society but they never answered back ! i would like to ask u if u can to clear this picture and to explain to me what i have seen there !
content.summary: Taking pictures of landscape and this object appears on one of my pic !

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine came to me shaking with fear claiming that the previous night she had been abducted by aliens. previous to this night she had told me multiple times that she sees the same ufos hovering above the horizon near her home. one night when i had went to her house we were sitting outside and i also witnessed the ufo hover above the horizon. the ufo has been commonly reported multiple times through  out the phoenix area and can be described as orange balls of light that dance above the horizon, very low in the sky. coming back to her story of abduction, she told me that she came home late in the night and went to sleep, only to be awoken a few hours later to a strange sensation come over her body. she was paralyzed and her room had went black. not the normal darkness one would imagine, but a complete, solid darkness, as if her vision was taken away. then, she felt herself spinning fast and blinking lights began to appear around her while she was spinning. she felt presences with her. then, she felt a dropping feeling and she felt her bed and could move. the lights from her tv buttons reappeared and all other sensations were gone.
content.summary: Abduction from bed queen creek arizona

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south at 2350, and witnessed a bright neon green fireball encapsulated in a bright red color with a white streak trailing behind. the object appeared almost firework like, although did not explode into color. it appeared as a falling star, but of much more vibrant colors. the object traveled from northeast to southwest toward the earth. it is unknown if the object actually struck earth as it fell behind the trees as i was driving. there was no noticeable noise, or electronic disturbance. the entire event lasted approximately 5 seconds. i was quite fascinated by the object.
content.summary: Large neon green fireball, encapsulated by bright red, with white streak trail falling toward earth.

content.detailedDescription: I have had contact and abduction seen more then can count ufos and have had all the vision and immeasureable feelings about all ... had a very clear contact 18 months ago with an et. i really would love to chat with mufon and maybe join ..  this is real and it is easy to understand when your like me, i have been shown some truth about this world ,, but dont know everything and really want to help others.
content.summary: Was light in window then looked hoverd over house then i chased with car then two more appeared fast and the one i was following vanished

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was sitting on the back porch facing north around 9pm pacific time listening to music and chatting with a friend. 
2. my friend pointed up into the sky straight ahead of us (north direction) and said "look!!"
3. i was unsure what the object was, as i have never seen anything too out of the ordinary before and it definitely did not resemble an airplane!
4. the object was too big to be a normal plane.  because it was dark, all i could see was a huge bright yellowish/gold colored light in the sky.. it was not blinking how planes do nor was it a star because there were many stars out tonight but none move.. this object was shaped odd and came from above east/northeast direction as it moved quickly downward/west direction.. it stopped and hovered in one area in particular for about 10-20 seconds before moving right and back up.. (i took some photos while it remained hovered) and then immediately left and back downwards to the position it was originally observed hovering over and continued to hover there for another 20 seconds (i took more photos..All of this happened within a matter of seconds).. then it took off and started heading in the east direction and eventually south moving higher and higher up into the sky (it was similar to watching a plane take off into the sky).. then i lost track of the object as i went back inside..
5.  my feelings during this were excited yet confused.  i wanted answers as to what i had just witnessed.. my reaction was quite inquisitive and intrigued.. thus i took some photographs.. after the sighting i took a few moments to process what i had just saw and thought to myself "have i lost my mind or was that really what i think i may have seen.. a ufo!!??"
6. i lost sight of the object because i walked back inside to get a drink
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Probable ufo sighted

content.detailedDescription:
Was looking up at orion's  belt from my 11th story balcony having a cigarette.( the site asked what i was thinking or how it made me feel) i was thinking about my day and asking for my new photography venture to be successful. i was admiring the stars and thinking about all the successful people in biz and was asking to be blessed in my current ventures. then saw what i thought was venus, i stared at it for about a minute or so and it seemed to be out of place. 

then it slowly started moving across the sky, it was dull orange. first thought it was a satellite, it was moving at that speed. then it made a slight change in direction more southwest like an arch pathway then straighten out on its new course.

 then i noticed one faint star behind it, and they were moving together for around 30 sec. then a triangle formation appeared and all 5-6 crafts were visible but faint.... i watched for 2-3 min. the lower back right craft was still a dull orange, but way brighter than the rest... while the others remained white like a dull stars. they moved across the sky steady even pace until i lost visual because of a sudden dense cloud cover. i ran in to grab my camera, but no luck capturing the right exposure as they were only dots in the sky. the sky cleared up around 10 min later with patchy clouds from todays storm and they had moved on out of sight.

i live in ny, and see the planes and helicopters flying by every night into jfk and lga airports from my 11th story apartment. i see their landing lights and blinking lights, and this was not anything i have ever witnessed.
content.summary: Was looking up @  orion's  belt, then saw what i thought was venus, then it started moving across the sky, dull orange. then i noticed one faint star behind it, then a triangle formation appeared and all 5-6 crafts were visible.... i watched for 5 min

content.detailedDescription: Few months ago my fiance and i will watching a movie, i'm not sure what it was but there was a scene in the movie with a ufo. we got into a conversation about it and she asked me if i had ever seen a ufo. i proceeded to tell her the same story that i'm about to tell you that i had never told anybody because to be quite honest... as i was telling her the story,memories were coming to me that i had completely put in the back of my mind. in 1995 i lived in a small town called dover missouri, it's a very small town about 60 miles east from kansas city. i was living with a girlfriend at the time and her brother.My girlfriend worked the night shift so i would stay up late at night and wait for her to get home in the morning. for some reason we decided to go to concordia missouri to a truck stop for coffee. the truck stop was about 25 to 30 miles away from where we were. my girlfriend's brother was driving his car and i was riding in the passenger seat. we left the house about 1230 or 1 o'clock in the morning, and proceeded to drive east on highway 24 leaving dover towards the exit to go to concordia. my girlfriend's brother had some god awful rap music playing in the car and i was looking out the window watching for deer. as i am looking out the window he is talking but i'm really not paying attention to what he is saying because i see a bright light about a mile ahead 200 feet off the ground ahead of us.I was able to gauge the distance because i could see beyond the water tower that i was familiar with at an orchard on 24 highway. i could clearly make out the red light was flashing on top of the water tower, and this light appeared to be just off to the side of it and above it. i watched the light for about a minute or two and i asked him if he saw what i saw. i can only describe it as a ball of light that changed colors. as we got closer i noticed that it was not moving it was stationary side by side with the light on top of the water tower. keep in mind this water tower is in the middle of nowhere there are no buildings around for at least 15 to 20 miles besides the barn that was on the opposite side of the road and is about half the height of the water tower. i remember telling him its not moving its not moving, we stop the car to get out and look at it and it started to move. this is the point of the story where my fiance asked me what happened next... and to be honest until she asked me that question i never thought about it, and i do not remember what happened next. my next memory is turning south onto the side road off of 24. and i'm not sure but i believe that it was much later when we arrived at the truck stop around 3 a.M. but it seemed perfectly normal to us at the time and remained that way until the night i was with my fiance 19 years later. as i have thought about it more the last month or so i remember flashes of images but i do not trust the images are accurate because as i said, im not sure what happened.
content.summary: After seeing the craft and exiting the car i do not remembergetting back in the car

content.detailedDescription: So i heard my dog barking outside, i looked out to see what he w a s barking and howling at. there was a giant orb, i started recording and i was recording i noticed these little lights shooting out of it the  dog seem to be chasing them.I continue to record for 8 to 10 minutes the orbs slowly disappeared like faded away as i went back and viewed the footage,he noticed face which appeared to be a grey.And then it looked like the face morphed into my deceased father then a woman..
content.summary: My dog started barking out in his hand i looked and saw a giant orb hovering above him. as i recored the orb the dog started chasing these weird things looked like lights..,

content.detailedDescription:
Background information

(1) i have a friend from germany who occasionally has been in the usa on business and vacation and who often visited me. he is an engineer who has worked for the max planck institute and motorola among other places. he has had a very interesting paranormal experience regarding duplicating the experiment of a max planck colleague in which strange voices ended up on recording tape deliberately recored but with the record level off. he did what his colleague did and got the same result. 

(2) and i have seen ufos all my life. i have had what i consider to be a paranormal experience too.    a - at age 15 or so, in winchester, mass., circa 1960-61, i reported a sighting of two silver disks traveling side by side at the height of a b-52 but zipping down the sky extremely fast while simultaneously vibrating in a  minuscule zig-zagway. b-52s in those days crawled down the sky, in comparison. i at that time collected bubble gum "airplane cards," built model planes, had an avid interest in astronomy and ufos and read about all of these. the reporter i wrote to was george fawcett and the newspaper he had a column in was the woburn times in massachusetts. i lived in winchester, the adjacent town. he wrote an article that mentioned me and other peoples in nearby towns. we had all seen the same thing.    b - circa 1964 in cambridge, mas.I saw a blue-green fireball streak rapidly in a straight low in the sky in broad daylight and vanish over the horizon.    c - circa 2006 i had an amazing close encounter with an orange-red-yellow-complected (like the complexion of the sun), pulsatingcircular disk--not an orb--sort of in the shape of a cd suspended in the sky. it was huge and right before me. i was in winchester on a street high above the rest of the town with a view overlooking a valley and walking to my car. while i saw it i "heard" (but knew it was in my mind, not via ears) a low pulsating vibration seemingly well under 20 hz and the type you feel, although i did not feel it. no sooner did i see it and simultaneously wonder "what the hell is that?" it shot sideways without changing altitude at the kind of  "warp speed" depicted in star trek and streaked-vanished behind me the house adjacent the house i was near.      d - as an observer of the skies i have observed round white lights behaving unusually from time to time in various states and countries.    e- i have had a few paranormal or spiritual events, very realistic and personally meaningful, from childhood through young adulthood, and circa age 14 i had some repeat-scenario, scary dreams of squadrons of delta-shaped ufos with round porthole windows and orange light inside flying silently over my family's back yard in the middle of the night as the neighborhood was asleep--long before i ever knew or imagined that there were ufos of this shape. 

all of this background is to show that my friend and i had been predisposed via prior paranormal experiences to being able to discuss them and "believe" in them. maybe, by being together, the apparatus for seeing them is enhanced.

the "experience" in vermont

my friend was here in winchester, mass., sometime in the 1990s, let's just say 1992 (which i base on knowing the approximate date of purchase the orange leather jacket i had just bought, which is in our photo on the day of the "experience.") and we decided to take a trip to vermont to see the foliage, so it was probably late september. we stopped and got out of the car at one of those 'scenic view' areas. there was a long wooden pier nearby. we walked down it to the end and asked someone there there to take my friend's camera and take our picture with our backs to the lake. and that was it! we did not see any ufos. we were not aware of any ufos. we had not been discussing ufos. my friend concluded his trip and returned to germany.

"photographic evidence"

my friend has the film developed from our day in vermont and sent me the photo of us on the wooden pier at the lake. it was nothing special, just a souvenir. a few years later i looked at it again and saw some small, pale-white, well-defined streaks in the cloudless sky and e-mailed my friend and wondered if they could be ufos. they were  definitely 'something' and 'not nothing.' he remarked when he replied that he saw them too in his copy. we didn't give it much more thought.

this year i have beeb going through boxes of slides, negatives, and old photos. i cane across the photo of my friend and me and had a brainstorm: scan it at high resolution and then blow it up to see what those two streaks might be. i did. they are both  definitely 'something' and 'not nothing'--on steroids, as the saying goes! one of them has so much detail kt is astounding, and yet while the detail is like nothing i have seen before in a ufo picture--looking physical, concrete and durable, constructed, of different and distinct colors as opposed to colored lights, and all kinds of detail i do not understand, such as a "shadow" that is not shadow-like but solid black (but how can there be a shadow mid-air?). it mimics what is above it rather than be a real shadow of it, as i view it.

"conclusion?"

i certainly don't know other than tell you as best i can about the history of what i discovered and think may be some unique photographic evidence of something or other. as i say, it is surely 'something' and 'not nothing.' both my friend and i see these marks in our photos. 

i am sending this to you today to ask what i should do. i am 68 now and in good health, but if i have a rare and valuable photo that the world ought to have access to, i want to take steps to get it out there as soon as possible. first,i would like to see what you have to say, if you are interested, or who you might recommend to "curate" the photo, and of course there are proprietary and legal concerns. some stranger took the photo on bruno's camera and film and i have a copy. it seems that my friend is the proprietor and owns the rights to the photo.

but the photo is amazing! i am hoping it is what i hope it is. i have considered it could be some photo-lab anomaly, but based on the complexity of the image i rule that out. a professional analysis is in order.

please contact me to discuss the photo. i want someone to come here to see it.
content.summary: I and my friend did not see the ufos until they showed up in a photo taken of us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my yard this particular night and noticed what i thought was a high flying jet, but it was not on what i observe as the only/normal air traffic route that i see. seldom are there ever planes in the air around here. i continued to observe and it suddenly took a near 90 degree turn to the west. i tried to rationalize what i saw by thinking maybe it as some kind of military air craft, but wondered how in the world could it be any air craft taking a turn that shap? then it broke/split into two lights for a small amount of time and they remained parallel to each other (4- seconds) then they split into four total lights. 

the lights were moving in a due west direction in a square shape (four corners) and then started whipping back and forth to each others positions. they did this about 20-30 times very fast. then they went back into two lights, then back to one and poof! gone....
content.summary: One light made a near 90 degree turn and then became 2 lights, then 4, then they whipped around at 90 + 45 degree turns and then back to 2 lights and then back to 1 and poof! gone!

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the upstairs window and saw what at first appeared to be a large bird but it looked different from other birds that were in the air at the time,first, it was very large ,second it was the way it moved,i kept looking for it to flap its wings and it never did,so thought it was riding the wind current,but it seemed odd it was flying again the wind and i was very windy ,then i thought well this had to be a plane but it was going very slow ,i thought that if it was a plane it would drop from the sky going that slow, i ran downstairs and looked out the front door i yelled for my mom but she didn't hear me,i could see it was black moving from west to east then i could see it bank left and go north thats when i could see it had a big red ball/bubble on the right wing and a large black one on the other wing(close to the body not in the middle of or on the end of the wing) no noise but i was inside and it was windy thats all i could hear was the wind blowing ,no lights blinking like a plane would have,as it flew away from me to the north it seemed to pick up speed ,not a lot, but faster and went out of sight.It gave me a strange feeling ,because i could not figure out what it could have been.It didnt move like a bird or a plane but looked very much like one or the other as far as the shape ,but it had more like a birds tail than a planes.I didnt not even grab my phone it is a cheap phone that takes terrible pics so i didnt even bother to try not that i would have had time to get to it anyway,i was disappointed that my mom didn't hear me,i wanted someone else to see this thing too,she had seen a big white orb with me about 3-4 years ago on almost the same path as this thing but it went from west to east and went into clouds it never turned it went west to east,at first i thought it was a white balloon,but it was a perfect orb ,im guessing about the size of a smart car it was pretty far up so im guessing that was how big it was there was nothing to give me a reference as to how high or big it was,it was going some what slow and steady until right before it went into the cloud then it zig zagged left to right then back and few times then right back to the path it was on and into the cloud.That is why i was wanting mom to see this one too.
content.summary: I saw what at first i thought it was a bird then i thought was a plane but it was neither.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning form a business trip driving notrth on us550 near san yasidro new mexico. i remember distinctly that the cd player in the truck stopped working as well as the radio. i ignored this as some kind of electrical problem i would have fixed the next day. about 1-2 miles from sn yisidro i noticed what at first looked like a cloud in the sky that was blocking out the stars. i though it was a bit strange but didn't think anything of it. the only thing that was on my mind was to make sure and slow down in san yisedro as the town has a long and storied history of handing out traffic tickets for even the slightest infraction. i clearly remember looking at my speedometer guage and slowing down as the speed limit drops long befor you get close to town. i remember driving and driving wondering wear is san yisedro? i drove for exactly 30min. and stopped on the side of the road in front of a sign that said angel peak senic area. this area is 170 miles northwest of san yisedro. i have no knowledge of driving that distance, passing any cars, nothing all i know is that i showed up somehow at this location. i tried to call my wife and found my cell phone battery was dead even though it was plugged into the charger. i was affraid to share what happened with anyone including my wife for fear that they may think the wrong things. after this encounter i have slowly over the years developed stress and anxiety issues, sleeplessness and have intentionally cut and injured myself for no reason. i lost my job in the oil and gas industry over anger issues. i don't know if anything happened that night or not but this is not he first issue that has happened in the north west platue that i cannot explain. please help.
content.summary: After seeing object i cannot account for the next 2.5 hours yet both myself and truck were 10 miles from our destination 170 miles from first sighting

content.detailedDescription:
When i came to the place i spot there was an white orb flying arround.....
fast i get my camera ready and i filmed it 11seconds and then it dissapier??

the next 10 minuts i filmed the sky's and then there was an airplane comming.

i stop filming and getted a sigaret, and then i looked again to the airplane.
but now it started to change direction and was flying straight up in the sky's.....

at first i thaught it's a optic illusion but it was to close by....

then i start filming again...... i was filming the strange direction from the airplane and then i saw a white orb comming out of the clouds....
it fly's in the direction of the airplane or what is was....

it flew to the airplane and they crossed, the orbs flews down and then it
stopped just like an alivator and change a little bit his direction....

there's no airbase in this area......[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

earlier for this movie i filmed to a strange airplane.... it looks like an spaceshuttle....On my channel are more movies from strange obejects in the area from enschede and diepenheim.

an the orange orbs are a lot from them here... filming them now over 11months they always come back to the same area.... every time i try to come closer, they always dissapier then. we tried everything to film it better, but it's glowing to much that we not can't see what for object is in it.
sometimes they flew arround over the threes and other times they a verry high in the air and are just seconds visible. we filmed a change in to an airplane. and in feb. we saw it landing and made pictures from it i raw withe the fotocamera....

in the netherlands are more and more sightings from this orbs the last months.

Clover point

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out around 1:00 am on november 17, 2014.  i heard what sounded like a slow helicopter propellar.  i looked at the sky and didn't see anything, then i saw a very large dark triangle shaped object with four dim yellow lights going down each side of the wings (8 lights total).  it was moving to the west in a slow and steady pace.  it was low enough i could barely see the outline against the night sky.  even my dog stopped and looked up and watched it.  we then went back inside and i thought i heard the same noise again (slow propellar sound)about 15 minutes later, but wasn't able to see anything.  my dog was very agitated and paced for sometime before being able to settle down, which is unusual for her.
content.summary: Triangle shaped, 4 dim yellow rectangle lights going down

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at around 6am to go to the toilet and noticed it was dawn. i also noticed that there was a strange glowing orb in the sky, about 80-120 ft away from my bedroom window and hovering over the flats. half-asleep at the time, and so thinking it must have been the moon or something, i left the room and went to the toilet. when i came back, however, i had woken up enough to realize that it was way too bright to be the moon. i observed it for another minute and didn't really know it was. it felt strange to observe, the way it was so bright and was so unlike anything i had ever seen before. bleary eyed and tired still, i reached for my phone and set the camera to work. my partner woke up and asked me what i was doing. i started taking pictures and told her. she saw the object as well but dismissed it as a star and told me to go back to bed and stop disturbing her. i remember thinking that it was way to big to be a star, or a planet, way too bright to be the moon, was clearly not the sun and was not a helicopter, plane or chinese lantern either. it was completely stationary and, as i say, very bright and unlike anything i had ever seen. all i knew at the time was it was weird. happy that i had at least taken some pictures, i went back to bed and dismissed it as a strange anomaly. it has bothered me for some time, though, especially that we did not watch it for longer. since then, i have kept looking at the photos, unsure of what to do with them. could this be a ufo? i would be very interested to submit this to mufon for your opinion, so here they are.
content.summary: Unwavering glowing orb - white in color with an amber tint - seen over north london

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my mother's place when all of a sudden our dog starts going crazy barking outside ,a very aggressive bark , which is very unlike her being she's such a gentle quiet dog (6years old ) . her barking like this made my mom jump up to go outside fast when she witnessed this un identified object , me and my sister went outside immediately when my mom screamed for us to come outside in shock .. i walked outside and seen something like i have never seen before , it was so close to the ground you could hear the loud humming noise and blinding lights that were pulsating different colors . it flew over us too quick for me to get my phone and take a picture but long enough for us too all stare in shock and watch it hover over us for a quick moment and then fly away as if it had titled to the side and shot up into the sky .. the object was square shaped but it was so dark it was hard to tell .. the top of it was black and it had four sets of lights horizontally on it : i am still in such shock, i have never ever seen anything like this before
content.summary: I am in shock .. i'm still trying to think of what this could have been

content.detailedDescription:
I saw nothing - i was in a car trying to photograph a van - major earthquake had devastated christchurch, new zealand september 4 2010. i was visiting  - i think this photo was taken soon after i arrived in christchurch (arrival on 17th, 2011). my mother was driving me around. i only noticed the black oval artefact after i examined the photo. i did not notice any object at the time -and i was not looking at the sky -but the windscreen was clean; i took photo through the front windscreen.

object appears to be oval, dark and flying on an oblique angle -it appears to be beyond the traffic lights on the right of the photo. i tried to magnify the image but maybe you will have more luck. there seems to be an electric blue light around it -but that might be nothing..

i would be interested to hear your evaluation. i did take two photos in succession - the object was only in one of them, the close up shot which i have included. it did not appear to be in the other one - (which i did not keep).

i heard ufos are often doing work to stabilise fault lines? christchurch experienced thousands of small earth tremors and quakes for about 2 years from the first big quake. the second big quake that saw 183 fatalities occurred about a month after this pic was taken.

i hope i am not wasting your time..
content.summary: Black oval object appears in photo, christchurch new zealand between the two earthquakes that made world headlines.

content.detailedDescription: Driving in the car, looked up saw the large object hovering over the ocean. at first thought it was a plane but it did not move. i was stopped at the time and did not see any motion. it disappeared after a few minutes.
content.summary: Long large cigar shaped craft hovering over the ocean, no airplanes anywhere despite proximity to lax

content.detailedDescription:
Saw something very interesting in the early morning sky about 3 weeks ago.  it was dark out and the stars above were clear. it was approximately 06:10 hours. i was taking the dogs outside. i always admire the stars while my dogs do their business.  directly above my head a brilliant flash of light appeared.  it reminded me of when the star ship voyager before it goes into warp on the popular tv show.   the brilliant flash of light opens up and a bright ball of light pops out from inside of it.  the flash of light closes, but the brilliant ball of light remains and starts traveling forward.   

the ball of light begins to slowly fade in brightness.  a few moments later, the ball of light faded to the point that it looked like a normal satellite floating across the night sky.  next i noticed another satellite type object trailing the first object.  the second object was a mile or so off to the right of the first one, and about a mile behind it.  i lost sight of both objects as they disappeared over the tree line.

for the last three weeks i've been outside looking up at about the same time i spotted the flash of light and where it came out of.  no satellites have been in that portion of the sky, traveling in the same direction since... 
i've seen a lot of satellites in the night sky.  i never saw a satellite reflect off the sun for more than a brief instant.  this satellite stayed bright for several moments after it came out of the vortex of light.
content.summary: Brilliant flash of light from which a satellite type object appeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were staying on a friends property near glendale, ut. we were just off of highway 89. last night it was very windy and i woke many times. i was lying in our sleeping bag when i heard something coming down the canyon. it sounded very loud and very low. it was a deep, constant hum. it got closer and closer at a very steady pace. as it neared it drowned out all other sound, including the shaking of our tent from the wind. i wondered if i spoke, would i hear my own voice? it never slowed and just kept moving down the canyon. it seemed to drag a wake of pleasant weather. there was no wind for a minute or two and the entire canyon was quiet. i couldn't hear a single car on 89. i thought of the eye of a hurricane. the storm gradually crept back in. i heard a truck flying down the highway through the shaking of the tent and the wind through the scrub oak. i eventually fell asleep. i can not think of what could have possibly flown over us last night. it was far too slow to be a plane and the sound was low and sustained, completely unbroken, unlike the chopping of a helicopter. i saw no light at all. 
today, on the drive home i told my girlfriend about it, i thought she had slept through it. she said she remembered it all and was too afraid to move.
content.summary: Loud low noise past slowly over tent

content.detailedDescription: I looked outside and saw an alien spaceship. wowzers!
content.summary: Me looked up to the sky and saw an alien spaceship!!!

content.detailedDescription:
On october 5th, 2014 at approximately 7 pm. i left my son's apartment to go to the store. it was still light out. i noticed the moon was bright and saw a commercial jet headed to love field or dfw airports. then i noticed a very bright, long object. it looked like the entire object was one lit up, not flashing like regular commercial planes. it was flying fast and high. i used my phone to take a picture of it. i captured the corner of one of the apartments to get maybe a size reference.  i watched it fly across the sky as i kept waking to keep it in view. it was blocked by an apartment and as i cleared the apartment, it was gone. when i zoomed in on the picture, it is clearly odd. i would like to know what i saw and if anyone else saw the same object. thank you for your time. 
sincerely,
name moved to fi box
content.summary: The object was solid glowing white, cigar shaped, heading north i took a picture with the corner of the apartment as a reference
